message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this excellent product.  I think it would be incredibly valuable for you. I'm asking for $20,000, which reflects the true worth of its capabilities.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $12,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Hi Bob, thanks for your reply. I understand your position, but $12,000 is significantly less than what I can accept.  How about we meet in the middle at $17,000?

Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. I am still unable to meet at $17,000. Considering the value of the product, I am willing to go up to $15,000. Let me know if this might be a feasible compromise.
